evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "Download from [releases](https://github.com/mrvollger/rustybam/releases) (may be slower than locally complied versions)."
"`rustybam` is a bioinformatics toolkit ... focused around manipulation of alignment (`bam` and `PAF`), annotation (`bed`), and sequence (`fasta` and `fastq`) files."
Usage is shown as a command-line tool: "rustybam [OPTIONS] <SUBCOMMAND>" and subcommands like "stats", "liftover", "trim-paf" that process research data formats.
